title: Golfling – Need for Seed
description:
This game was created as part of a Kolibri Games internal Game Jam, called the New Games Summer Jam 2023. The goal was to explore new ideas, and my team and I developed this small but polished prototype. I contributed heavily to the conceptualization and was responsible for everything related to player controls and movement, including their visual representation. This also gave me extensive hands-on experience with Unity’s physics system.

  • Gameplay concept development
  • Player control and movement systems
  • Physics-based interaction and visual feedback
  • Year: 2023
  • Platform: Android
  • Engine: Unity
